input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: BCANActor

items The items XML used to find on an item within BMC Configuration Automation Networks Application.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values: getConfiguration getDevices getSpanActionResults getSimpleGroups getJobApprovalTypes getSubstitutionParameterByName getTemplateGroupByName getAllPredefinedJobNames getPredefinedJobNames getPredefinedJobParameterTypes getAllSharedRuntimeParameters retrieveJobStatusByJobID getAllFirewallRules
Below operations are supported for version v8.9 getUsers getUserByKey getUserByName getComplianceDetailResults getComplianceSummaryResults getRule getRules getAbbreviatedCorrectableRules

version The BMC Configuration Automation Networks Application version. The current supported version is v5.2, v5.3, v5.4 and v8.1.
v5.4 currently supports only 1 operation i.e. Get All Shared Runtime Parameters v8.1 currently supports only 1 operation i.e.Get All Firewall Rules Parameters v8.9 - UserService and ComplianceService get operations are supported

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> <soap-version></soap-version> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description: Find Items support following operations: Get Devices Get Configuration Get Span Action Results Get Simple Groups Get Job Approval Types Get Template Group By Name Get Substitution Parameter By Name Get All Predefined Job Names Get Predefined Job Names Get Predefined Job Parameter Types Get All Shared Runtime Parameters Retrieve Job Status By Job ID Get All Firewall Rules
